author: philharveyonline
msg: PROTON-192: reduce visibility of constructors to enforce use of factories, thereby abstracting away proton-j vs proton-c-via-JNI.

author: philharveyonline
msg: PROTON-194: made proton-j the default profile in top level pom. Also Improved JythonTest error reporting

author: pamarcelot
msg: Moved to the 2.4 version of the 'maven-assembly-plugin' to fix the issue on tar.gz packaging distributions.

author: markt
msg: Performance improvement for pages with lots of heavily nested tags. Retain a reference to the root JSP context rather than traversing the hierarchy on every call.
Based on a patch suggested by Sheldon Shao.
